abstract: Citigroup is considering the sale of its commodities unit, known as Phibro, but no deal is imminent and the plan to sell the group could fall through, The Financial Times reported.
snippet: Citigroup is considering the sale of its commodities unit, known as Phibro, but no deal is imminent and the plan to sell the group could fall through, The Financial Times reported.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup is considering the sale of its commodities unit, known as Phibro, in a move that could raise hundreds of millions of dollars, The Financial Times reported.

headline.main: Citi Said to Consider Sale of Commodities Unit
